document.full_text: u.s. education secretary arne duncan renewed calls for the n.c.a.a. to stop rewarding schools whose teams graduate fewer than 50 percent of their athletes.
document.title: duncan: n.c.a.a. should stop rewarding schools with poor academic record
lines_and_colors: u.s. education secretary arne duncan renewed calls for the n.c.a.a. to stop rewarding schools whose teams graduate fewer than 50 percent of their athletes.
